description: CEFR sub-level framework for Aula PT. Each sub-level defines what a learner should know at that point. Tracked independently per section: conjugations, vocabulary, grammar.

A1.1.label: First verbs
A1.1.description: Can conjugate SER and ESTAR in the present tense.

A1.2.label: Essential irregular verbs
A1.2.description: Can conjugate TER, IR, and FAZER in the present tense.

A1.3.label: Core irregular verbs
A1.3.description: Can conjugate essential irregular verbs including PODER, QUERER, DIZER, VER, DAR, SABER, VIR, and SAIR.

A1.4.label: Regular -AR verbs
A1.4.description: Can conjugate common regular -AR verbs in the present tense.

A1.5.label: All A1 present tense
A1.5.description: Can conjugate all A1 verbs (-AR, -ER, -IR and irregular) in the present tense.

A2.1.label: Past tense basics
A2.1.description: Can conjugate core verbs in the preterite (past) tense.

A2.2.label: Preterite irregular verbs
A2.2.description: Can conjugate irregular verbs in the preterite tense.

A2.3.label: Preterite regular and essential verbs
A2.3.description: Can conjugate regular and essential verbs across present and preterite.

A2.4.label: Preterite confidence
A2.4.description: Confident with all A1 and A2 verbs in present and preterite.

A2.5.label: Present and preterite mastery
A2.5.description: Mastery of all verbs in present and preterite tenses.

B1.1.label: Imperfect introduction
B1.1.description: Can use the imperfect tense with common verbs.

B1.2.label: Imperfect and future
B1.2.description: Can use imperfect and future tenses across all verb types.

B1.3.label: Conditional
B1.3.description: Can use the conditional tense in addition to all previous tenses.

B1.4.label: Present subjunctive
B1.4.description: Can form the present subjunctive for all verb types.

B1.5.label: All tenses mastery
B1.5.description: Full mastery of all verb conjugations across all tenses.

A1.1.label: First words
A1.1.description: Knows basic greetings and common expressions.

A1.2.label: Numbers and colours
A1.2.description: Knows numbers 1-20, basic colours, and time words.

A1.3.label: Food and travel basics
A1.3.description: Can name common foods, drinks, and basic travel words.

A1.4.label: Home and family
A1.4.description: Knows words for family members, home rooms, and daily activities.

A1.5.label: All A1 vocabulary
A1.5.description: Knows all A1-level words across every category.

A2.1.label: Getting around
A2.1.description: Expanded travel, directions, and health vocabulary.

A2.2.label: Nature and emotions
A2.2.description: Can describe nature, animals, and express emotions.

A2.3.label: Home and daily life
A2.3.description: Deeper vocabulary for home, routines, and work.

A2.4.label: Broad A2 vocabulary
A2.4.description: Confident with A1 and A2 words across most categories.

A2.5.label: A2 vocabulary mastery
A2.5.description: Full command of all A1 and A2 vocabulary.

B1.1.label: Colloquial and slang
B1.1.description: Understands informal Portuguese expressions and slang.

B1.2.label: Advanced food and travel
B1.2.description: Expanded food, cooking, and travel vocabulary.

B1.3.label: Advanced topics
B1.3.description: Deeper vocabulary for health, work, home, and nature.

B1.4.label: Full vocabulary range
B1.4.description: Confident with words across all categories and CEFR levels.

B1.5.label: Vocabulary mastery
B1.5.description: Full command of all vocabulary from A1 through B1.

A1.1.label: Gender and articles
A1.1.description: Understands noun gender and definite/indefinite articles.

A1.2.label: Subject pronouns and SER vs ESTAR
A1.2.description: Knows all subject pronouns. Understands when to use SER vs ESTAR.

A1.3.label: Present tense formation
A1.3.description: Can form the present tense for -AR, -ER, and -IR verbs.

A1.4.label: Sentence building
A1.4.description: Can build sentences with proper structure, negation, and questions.

A1.5.label: A1 grammar complete
A1.5.description: Full command of all A1 grammar including prepositions and contractions.

A2.1.label: Past tense grammar
A2.1.description: Understands regular and irregular preterite formation.

A2.2.label: Possessives and demonstratives
A2.2.description: Can use possessive adjectives and demonstrative pronouns.

A2.3.label: Pronouns and placement
A2.3.description: Understands direct/indirect object pronouns and their placement.

A2.4.label: Reflexive verbs and comparatives
A2.4.description: Can use reflexive verbs and make comparisons.

A2.5.label: A2 grammar mastery
A2.5.description: Full command of all A1 and A2 grammar topics.

B1.1.label: Imperfect tense
B1.1.description: Can form the imperfect and distinguish preterite vs imperfect.

B1.2.label: Future, conditional, and ir+infinitive
B1.2.description: Can use future tense, conditional, and ir + infinitive.

B1.3.label: Present subjunctive
B1.3.description: Understands subjunctive formation and common triggers.

B1.4.label: Relative pronouns and connectors
B1.4.description: Can use relative pronouns and complex connectors.

B1.5.label: B1 grammar mastery
B1.5.description: Full command of all grammar from A1 through B1.

placementTest.description: Each section has an adaptive placement test. Questions start at A1.3 difficulty and adjust based on accuracy. 15 questions per section, results map to a sub-level.
